Posts.Content: Don't be afraid of ultrasounds or biopsies. Just had both on my right breast and felt NOTHING as far as any kind of pain. Some pressure but really, NO pain. Don't be afraid. Get this checked out. Likely its not anything to worry about (fatty tumor, scar tissue, cyst, etc.)  But you must get this checked out. Besides, just to have you mind at ease is worth it.
Posts.Title: untreated breast cancer for around 8 years. What next?
